greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sum 1/(p*(p+2)) over the primes p.
comment: If we omit the first term 1/(2*4)=0.125 from the sum, 0.138672... remains, which is an upper limit of A209329 in the sense that we "fake" prime gaps of 2 here [which are actually larger on average].
formula: Equals -1/8 + Sum_{k>=2} (-1)^k * 2^(k-2) * P(k), where P is the prime zeta function. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 13 2021
maple: # insert coding of ZetaM(s,M) and Hurw(a) from A179119 here...
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 21 2013
